executable.title: Label CVT Cells Based on Anatomical Label Map (TubeTK)
executable.description: Assign an anatomical label to each cell in a Central Voronoi Tesselation (CVT).
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

file.name: argSegImageFileName
file.description: Filename of the input image file containing segmentations.

file.name: argCVTImageFileName
file.description: File name of the Central-Voronoi-Tesellation (CVT) input image file.

file.name: argDistanceSignatureFileName
file.description: File name of the distance signature file (one entry per CVT cell).

file.name: argCVTCenterFileName
file.description: File name of the CVT center file.

string.name: argOutputDirectory
string.label: Distance Map Directory
string.description: Basepath of the directory containing the distance map files. If no distance maps exists, they are recomputed

integer.name: argSignatureSelector
integer.label: Signature Type
integer.description: The type of distance signature to use (0 ... D(Segment,CVT-Center), 1 ... min D(Segment,CVT cell)).

integer-vector.name: argExcludeRegions
integer-vector.description: Specify regions (e.g., background) to exclude for distance signature computation.
integer-vector.label: Exclusion Regions
